title.rendered: Glamour and glitter for a cause

content.rendered:
It was day filled with glamour and glitter as 15 girls from a Mission Education centre in Mumbai walked the ramp with some prominent names from Bollywood to create awareness about the importance of education of girls. The girls learnt to take on the ramp from the best of the best as celebrities like Isha Koppikar and Deepika Singh also walked for the cause.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 750,000 children and their families every year, through more than 350 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 1000 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
